CONTACT US

We are happy to connect with you at Amrapali Boutique.

Please feel free to contact us for any query, concern, suggestion, or just about anything to do with us.

Customer Care

Timings: 11:30 am - 8:00 pm (Closed on Thursdays)

Mail: care@amrapaliboutique.in (For exchanges and returns)

WhatsApp and Call: +91-9987626121

Marketing and Media

Mail: admin@amrapaliboutique.in

WhatsApp and Call: +91-9833526707

Follow Us

Instagram: www.instagram.com/amrapaliboutique

Facebook: www.facebook.com/amrapaliboutique

Visit Our Store

Store Address:

Amrapali Boutique
106/B Srimani Bagan
G.T Road,
Chandannagar- 712136.
Hooghly
West Bengal
Landmark: Next to Chandannagar Telephone Exchange
Nearest Railway Station: Mankundu

Timings: 11:30 AM to 9:00 PM IST (Store closed on Thursdays, Regional and National Holidays)

); }; export default ContactUs;
